name: No Tomorrow?!
description:
This is a game made for the 1 day game jam!

Help steve collect the clocks or there's no tomorrow! With his pal Lucas!

Little error: tutorial says crouch with shift but theres no crouch button or even codded in... I'll fix it later (remove the text).

Credit:

Art = Tassilo593

Music = Sonic 1 SMS OST owned by SEGA
